channel.title: Comments on: Life on the edge in the Atacama Desert

item.title: By: Four months of South America in photos - Duff's Suitcase
item.dc:creator: Four months of South America in photos - Duff's Suitcase
item.description: […] getting soaked under the spray of Iguazu Falls, hiking the otherworldly landscape of Chile’s Atacama Desert, where I stood under huge steaming geysers and floated in salt lagoons, 4x4ing through the desert […]
item.content:encoded: […] getting soaked under the spray of Iguazu Falls, hiking the otherworldly landscape of Chile’s Atacama Desert, where I stood under huge steaming geysers and floated in salt lagoons, 4x4ing through the desert […]

item.title: By: Sarah Duff
item.dc:creator: Sarah Duff
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/life-on-the-edge-in-the-atacama-desert/#comment-92439">Sid</a>.
Thank you! Yes, I'm heading to Ecuador in December to visit the Galapagos, a cloud forest and climb some volcanoes. I've always wanted to go to the Galapagos so it's a dream for me too!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Sid.

Thank you! Yes, I’m heading to Ecuador in December to visit the Galapagos, a cloud forest and climb some volcanoes. I’ve always wanted to go to the Galapagos so it’s a dream for me too!

item.title: By: Sid
item.dc:creator: Sid
item.description: Love your pictures. Are you planning to head to Ecuador? It's my ultimate dream destination.
item.content:encoded: Love your pictures. Are you planning to head to Ecuador? It’s my ultimate dream destination.
